categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thadus was a male Imperial soldier who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. A sergeant in the Imperial Army, he was stationed on Balmorra, where he ferried messages for Darth Lachris.

Thadus appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a messenger who starts the final world-arc missions on the Imperial version of Balmorra. He only identifies himself in dialogue to Imperial Agents, and is named simply "Imperial Messenger" as an NPC.
